title: Columbia Men's Endless Trail Training Jogger
features: OMNI-SHIELD: For light precipitation and everyday protection against stains, this garment repels rain, resists stains, and dries quickly.
MADE TO MOVE: These training joggers are crafted from an abrasion-resistant polyester weave with a hint of stretch for a wide range of motion.
HANDY FEATURES: Trail-ready touches include two hand pockets, ankle zippers, a zippered back pocket, and reflective details that help keep you seen.
ACTIVE FIT: Lightweight and cut for active wear, these joggers will feel comfortable during almost any outdoor adventure.

BUILT TO LAST: Columbiaâ€™s attention to detail is what sets our apparel apart. Specifying only the highest quality materials, expert stitching, and craftsmanship. This is a long-lasting garment you will enjoy for seasons to come.
description: A jogger with all the stretch and comfort needed for running, plus Omni-Shield advanced repellency against rain and stains. This pair is cut from a lightweight and abrasion-resistant fabric, with reflective details that help with visibility. Additional features include two hand pockets, ankle zippers, and a zippered back pocket for stashing trail fuel. Columbia offers these jogger pants in multiple colors and sizes. Active Fit.
